details.label: Lesbian
details.description: A woman who is emotionally, romantically, or sexually attracted to other women.

details.label: Gay
details.description: A person who is emotionally, romantically, or sexually attracted to people of the same gender. Often used specifically to refer to men attracted to men.

details.label: Bisexual
details.description: A person who is emotionally, romantically, or sexually attracted to more than one sex or gender.

details.label: Transgender
details.description: An umbrella term for people whose gender identity is different from the sex assigned at birth.

details.label: Queer
details.description: A term used by some people, particularly younger people, whose sexual orientation is not exclusively heterosexual. Often used by those who reject traditional gender identities.

details.label: Intersex
details.description: A term used to describe a variety of conditions in which a person is born with reproductive or sexual anatomy that doesnâ€™t fit the typical definitions of female or male.

details.label: Asexual
details.description: A person who experiences little or no sexual attraction to others.
